quoteText: Apple and its partners and licensors must collect, use, transmit, process and maintain your location data, including but not limited to the geographic location of your device and information related to your iCloud account (“Account”) and any devices registered thereunder, including but not limited to your Apple ID, device ID and name, and device type
title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data
